list.title: module:Comms.BLEPeerClient
list.description: A simple BLE socket ⚠️ Warning: This class maybe significantly refactored in future releases

list.title: module:Db.ISchema.permissions
list.description: Collection level read/new/change permissions

list.title: module:Db.LokiDb
list.description:
A db implementation based on LokiJS.

Ideal for frontend apps with small datasets (smaller than total RAM). This is an in-memory db so it trades RAM efficiency for access speed.

list.title: module:Db.TingoDb
list.description: Ideal for extremely large datasets with frequent document additions. Has a very efficient append-only file system driver which is ideal for embedded platforms. All database indexes must fit into RAM and are re-computed at db load time.

list.title: module:Db.ZangoDb
list.description: Ideal for frontend apps with large datasets (larger then total RAM). This is an IndexedDb based driver so it span to nearly 1/3 of total system storage spave available to the browser/app.

list.title: module:Party.DocumentFactory
list.description: Represents document schemas mapped to contructor claasses which extend IDocument

list.title: module:Party.IDocument
list.description: Represents a document with caching and local+remote change notifications

list.title: module:Party.IDocument.cleanData
list.description: document data with no library added fields

list.title: module:Party.IDocument.data
list.description: entire document

list.title: module:Party.IDocument.id
list.description: Document mongo-id

list.title: module:Party.IDocument.idObj
list.description: Document id object

list.title: module:Party.IDocument.idString
list.description: Document id string in format <type>:<mongo-id>

list.title: module:Party.IDocument.revision
list.description: Document revision string

list.title: module:Party.IDocument.type
list.description: Document type string

list.title: module:Party.IDocument.unwatch
list.description: Stop watching for remote document changes

list.title: module:Party.IDocument.watchField
list.description: Watch a field for changes. If value is supplied watches for field and value to match.

list.title: module:Party.IDocument#event:change
list.description: Document change Event - This is event is triggered when a document has been modified on the CloudParty service

list.title: module:Party.IDocument#event:create
list.description: Document modified Event - This event is triggered after a change has been applied to the backing cache of Document.data. If Document.followcache is true the document doc has also accepted the change.

list.title: module:Party.IDocument#event:field
list.description: Field change event. This is emitted as field.[FIELD_PATH]

list.title: module:Party.IDocument#event:value
list.description: Document value Event - This event is triggered after a change has been applied to the backing cache of Document.data. Only fired when Document.followcache is true.

list.title: module:Party.IParty.find
list.description: Starts a query

list.title: module:Party.LokiParty
list.description:
A local party based on LokiJS.

Works great for front end. Doesn't scale well for centralized server use and does not have efficient file system representation for many embedded applications. Overall this driver is RAM bound holds the entire DB in memory. When running on filesystems this driver re-writes the entire collection during save operations.

list.title: module:Party.MongoParty
list.description:
A party implementation based on Mongodb and mongoose.

The humongouse database we all know all love. If you need a multi-region HA database, this is the one.

list.title: module:Party.Query.all
list.description: matches a list that is a superset of given list

list.title: module:Party.Query.and
list.description: following path segments will be anded (default behavior)

list.title: module:Party.Query.contains
list.description: Check if field contains value

list.title: module:Party.Query.dna
list.description: Closes scope of most recent and

list.title: module:Party.Query.elem
list.description: list operators -> subtype of match tree nodes -> most recent .where('param') path must be list for these to match searches for a single element of list matching all following conditions between elem .. mele nodes where('path') calls are relative to param path scope at opening of element match

list.title: module:Party.Query.equals
list.description: Check if field equals value

list.title: module:Party.Query.exec
list.description: return a promise resolving to result of query

list.title: module:Party.Query.exists
list.description: Check if field exists

list.title: module:Party.Query.gt
list.description: Check if field is greater than value

list.title: module:Party.Query.id
list.description: query for single msg by given id prereq -> type (not types) all other query ops (except type) will be ignored

list.title: module:Party.Query.ids
list.description: query for a list of msgs by given ids prereq -> type (not types) all other query ops (except type) will be ignored

list.title: module:Party.Query.in
list.description: Check if field is in list of values

list.title: module:Party.Query.limit
list.description: limit # of msgs returned by query to a maximum of count

list.title: module:Party.Query.lt
list.description: Check if field is less than value

list.title: module:Party.Query.mele
list.description: Close elem function stack

list.title: module:Party.Query.or
list.description: The following path segments will be or'ed

list.title: module:Party.Query.owner
list.description: restrict query to msgs with owner matching given type, id pair

list.title: module:Party.Query.regex
list.description: Check if field is matched by regex

list.title: module:Party.Query.ro
list.description: Close scope of most recent or

list.title: module:Party.Query.seelct
list.description: filter fields from parameters of returned msgs

list.title: module:Party.Query.size
list.description: matches list with exactly count items

list.title: module:Party.Query.sort
list.description: sort returned msgs on given param path (leading '-' reverses sort)

list.title: module:Party.Query.type
list.description: restrict query to msgs of given type

list.title: module:Party.Query.types
list.description: restrict query to msgs of given types not compatible with type

list.title: module:Party.Query.where
list.description: sets context for following operations to given param path

list.title: module:Party.TingoParty
list.description: A local party implementation based on TingoDB Ideal for extremely large datasets with frequent document additions. Has a very efficient append-only file system driver which is ideal for embedded platforms. All database indexes must fit into RAM and are re-computed at db load time.

list.title: module:Party.ZangoParty
list.description:
A local party implementation based on IndexedDb via ZangoDB

Ideal for frontend apps with large datasets (larger then total RAM). This is an IndexedDb based driver so it span to nearly 1/3 of total system storage spave available to the browser/app.

list.title: module:Service.EndpointContext.identity
list.description: Effective root of trust

list.title: module:Service.EndpointContext.senderKey
list.description: Key used to encrypt content. This may be an ephermal key or a long lived key.
